gear.mainhand: {id: "iceandfire:dragonbone_sword_fire", Count: 1b, tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Meteorite Katana"}',Lore:['{"text":"This blade belonged to a feared and powerful Piglin Lord, The Legend states it was forged thousands of years ago from a Meteorite containing and unknown metal. Use it with caution, for its blade is regarded as one of the sharpest objects in existence"}']},Enchantments:[{lvl: 8s, id: "minecraft:sharpness"}]}}

gear.offhand: {id: "kubejs:loyalty_card_generic", Count: 1b, tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"§7Half Digested Loyalty Card"}',Lore:['{"text":"§2§oYuck! You should wash your hands after touching this... Someone lost their loyalty card..."}']},Enchantments:[{lvl: 1s, id: "minecraft:vanishing_curse"}]}}
